attributes.action: The island's first concrete skate park
attributes.additional_details:
This is a petition to get a well built concrete skate park built on the isle of wight. A park that is built and made by 1skateparks!

Please get involved and support this petition!
The island is desperately in need of a safe and well built park. Where ramp's, ledge's, rail's etc! are built specifically for theses type's of sport's. That can be benefit all age's!

We want the local government to get involved and listen to what is needed! to help source suitable land or environment where the park can be!

rejection.details: One for the Local council to build/decide.
